posts.post_content:
*** SOLD ***

Up for sale here are some T206 triples I've had for a while. As you can see, these are lower-grade - some very low grade.

Most are common backs but there are two Polar Bears here. The Snodgrass is even a pretty nice low grade card IMO with only some creasing.

The Jackson looks to be in great shape. However, I was told when I bought it that it was believed to be trimmed. It measures up well with the rest of these but as such, please keep that in mind. It is not an obvious trim as I have seen before but I am selling under that assumption since the previous owner believed it to be trimmed. Very high eye appeal on that one.

Included are:

Barbeau - Sweet Cap 350
Bell Follow Through - Piedmont 350-460
Brain - POLAR BEAR
Davidson - Piedmont 350
Gasper - Piedmont 350
Jackson - Sweet Cap 350
McGlynn - Sweet Cap 350
Oldring - Piedmont
Rhoades Arms at Chest - Piedmont
Schlei Batting - Piedmont 350-460
Snodgrass Catching NY - POLAR BEAR
Wiltse Throwing - Sweet Cap 350

Price is SOLD delivered for the lot, which comes out to a little more than xx per card with free shipping. At this time, I'm not interested in selling individually. If you have any specific questions about condition, feel free to shoot me a message.

Thanks for looking.
